title: WEBSITE NOT WORKING !!!!!!!!!!
body:
Guy help. I need to  re-install league of legends but  the https://signup.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload from were to download the installer leads you to a "server not found" plz help i need to play. 
:)
 HELPPPPPPPP

replies.body: I am having the same problem? did you find a way of getting it working?
I really need help I can't open it as well and I can't go a day without playing it. Can riot plzzz fix this its gone to far with out them knowing!!
Many people are also experiencing this issue. Some have found setting a manual DNS works, but most haven't.
